channel.title: Requesting a banner & favicon
channel.description:
Hey guys.
Turns out I've decided to launch a new RSPS alongside the elve age, deathschaos9 and clawz fury! This is looking extremely promising, but I'm about as good at graphical design as I am at knitting - not very. If someone could possibly make us a banner revolving around Tartarus, which is from greek mythology: [quote="Wikipedia"]In Greek mythology, Tartarus is both a deity and a place in the underworld. In ancient Orphic sources and in the mystery schools, Tartarus is also the unbounded first-existing entity from which the Light and the cosmos are born.[/quote] If you could make something revolving around this it would be great, the favicon could be anything as long as it relates! Also, the text "Tartarus Online" must be somewhere inside that banner.
Thanks!

item.title: Requesting a banner & favicon
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

Hey guys.

Turns out I’ve decided to launch a new RSPS alongside the elve age, deathschaos9 and clawz fury! This is looking extremely promising, but I’m about as good at graphical design as I am at knitting - not very. If someone could possibly make us a banner revolving around Tartarus, which is from greek mythology:

Wikipedia:

In Greek mythology, Tartarus is both a deity and a place in the underworld. In ancient Orphic sources and in the mystery schools, Tartarus is also the unbounded first-existing entity from which the Light and the cosmos are born.

If you could make something revolving around this it would be great, the favicon could be anything as long as it relates! Also, the text “Tartarus Online” must be somewhere inside that banner.

Thanks!

Read full topic
